column1: Little Goat Diner////I came here a few years ago
column2: and left feeling nauseas and ended up throwing up multiple times later in the day. I thought maybe it was just what I ordered
column3: or something else I had that day. But I went back yesterday with a friend of mine
column6: both left feeling sick to our stomachs. Don't get me wrong
column7: the coffee is GREAT! But the food caused my friend and I both to throw up a gross amount. I would not recommend.
